thread.title: Bouncy Castle Rave coming to Southampton
thread.title_full: Bouncy Castle Rave coming to Southampton

title: Bouncy Castle Rave coming to Southampton
text:
4 comments 
IT’S an adventure playground for adults. 
Regression Sessions, the youthful club night dubbed the Bouncy Castle Rave, is coming to Switch in Southampton for the first time in the run up to Christmas. 
The events, which have taken off around the UK and Europe, combine carefully considered music selection with unrivalled, awe-inspiring production, an unpretentious crowd, a dark twist of glitz and glam, and a real old school hedonistic vibe. 
Exceptional resident DJs spend the night playing quality underground music with all the shenanigans as a bonus. The play list for the nights draw on house, techno, UK Garage, drum and bass, plus a considerable dose of disco. 
From the outset you’re involved, with wild games and entertainment while you queue. Once inside, there are ball pits, bouncy castles, space hoppers, inflatables, face painters, magicians, caricature artists, jungle anthem pass the parcel and retro video games. 
Enjoy a dedicated LEGO area, a host of inflatable animals, a photo booth, giant Jenga and other retro games and bubble wrap popping! 
All of this is soundtracked by top international DJs from the likes of Rinse FM, i-D Magazine and Fabric. 
Expect a no expenses spared, sensory-stimulating experience with rib-rattling sound, mesmeric lights and lasers on Saturday December 12. Share article 
Organisers launched the underground party series in a bid to regress back to a sillier, more youthful time. 
Tickets are available at skiddle.com . Promoted Stories Bouncy Castle Rave coming to Southampton   MayorOfWeston 6:06pm Thu 15 Oct 15 
What a load of poppycock What a load of poppycock MayorOfWeston
